fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Trans-European Networks
eu_initiatives: Since the organization is recently set up, therefore, our current activities are limited to follow the different European parliament committee and its intergroup activities which deal with Human rights and based on that makes awareness in public at large to make themselves aware about there fundamental rights.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: we are approaching the different national and international organizations working for the protection of Human rights under the aegis of EU in order to work with them.
goals__remit:
Human Right Forum is an NGO working actively to protect human rights at the national level and providing support to members in particular and public at large by taking positive and peaceful action. we also support Human rights programs as one of our main objectives. 
 
Field of Interest 
 
1. Contributing towards all efforts, which aim to preserve and protect freedoms, defend human right and dignity and refute all forms of racial discrimination and violence. 
2. Encouraging active participation of its members within the framework of the European Union in a manner that serves overall interest.  
3. Building bridges with its members and public authorities and institutions, in both European Union and an international arena within the framework of mutual interest.
